articles.title: Americans among more than 350 passengers who departed Kabul on evacuation flight Sunday - CNN
articles.description: One of the largest evacuation flights departed Kabul on Sunday with an unknown number of Americans on board and is on its way to Doha, a senior Qatari government official tells CNN.
